bwwExcerpt: The show itself? An odd duck. The songs are by the 'Hairspray' duo of Marc Shaiman and Scott Wittman, who are very adept at writing and arranging pop songs that fly by effortlessly without leaving much of an impression. They're played by a sensational onstage swing band.

keyPhrases.quote: An odd duck... songs that fly by effortlessly without leaving much of an impression.
